page.title: 06University College(U.C.N.W.)
page.content: The University College of North Wales (UNCW) is celebrating its Centenary year.It was founded on 18th October 1884 ,and now has almost 3000 students from all over the world.Welsh students has dropped from 90% to 20%. The main college building stands in Upper Bangor to the north west of the town.It provides jobs for many people and makes Bangor an intresting place to live in.With the city it has built a sports hall ,a theatre and an orchestra and groups visit to give Concerts. During the holidays the college buildings are used for conferences and package holidays for elderly people. UNCW is an important part of Bangor both culturally and economically and effects the lives of many people.
